channel.title: How to... (3 questions)
channel.description:
Hey there,
I have two questions. :confused:
They are:
1) How can I change the teleport that says 'Soon...' in the MiniGame tab of teleports. (Or just any of the multiple tabbed teleports. [IMG]http://i640.photobucket.com/albums/uu128/RSHOSTER/Capture-1.jpg[/img]
2) How do I make a command that brings up a scroll that can be read. e.g. with all the commands on the scroll, or different rules. :confused:
3) How would I add a teleport for the 'Ape Atol' Icon that is currently not being used? :confused:
Thanks :P

item.title: How to... (3 questions)
item.dc:creator: @x1_f4t3_1x x1 f4t3 1x
item.description:
@x1_f4t3_1x wrote:

yeah client.java
any command you make goes in client.java

item.description:
@PKingKingScape wrote:

Okay, but in which file? Client.java??

item.title: How to... (3 questions)
item.dc:creator: @miyu_miyu5 miyu miyu5
item.description:
@miyu_miyu5 wrote:

[quote=“PKingKingScape, post:3, topic:298511”]Thanks you so much. Just a one question:
When you say this; [quote author=miyu miyu5 link=topic=394908.msg2935853#msg2935853 date=1251557454]

  1. You make a command like this

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("COMMANDNAME")) { MENUNAME(); }
Replace the command name with with ur command name, and the MENUNAME with any name that will call ur menu, now make a method like this,

[code]public void menuname()
{
sendQuest("@dre@menuname", 8144);
clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest("::splitbark", 8147);
sendQuest("::dweaps", 8148);
sendQuest("::zammy", 8149);
sendQuest("::sara", 8150);
sendQuest("::guthix", 8151);
sendQuest("::pker", 8152);
sendQuest("::melee", 8153);
sendQuest("::pots", 8154);
sendQuest("::pureeq", 8155);
sendQuest("", 8156);
sendQuest("", 8157);
sendQuest("@blu@Tele/Mini-Game/Places Commands", 8158);
sendQuest("::kqueen", 8159);
sendQuest("::kbdcave", 8160);
sendQuest("::torso", 8161);
sendQuest("::pocketportal", 8162);
sendQuest("::range", 8163);
sendQuest("", 8164);
sendQuest("@blu@Mods Commands", 8165);
sendQuest("::modlook", 8166);
sendQuest("::pk", 8167);
sendQuest("::cwarmor", 8168);
sendQuest("@blu@Admin Commands", 8169);
sendQuest("::sweet", 8170);
sendQuest("::banuser (username)", 8171);
sendQuest("::xrichie", 8172);
sendQuest("::ring", 8173);
sendQuest("::alltome", 8174);
sendQuest("::vent (text)", 8175);
sendQuest("::gang", 8176);
sendQuest("::ownage", 8177);
sendQuest("::dbones", 8178);
sendQuest("::rares", 8179);
sendQuest("::update “, 8180);
sendQuest(”::pure", 8181);
sendQuest("::master", 8181);
sendQuest("::balla", 8181);
sendQuest(“Owner Commands”, 8182);
sendQuest("::holyforce", 8183);

sendQuestSomething(8143);
showInterface(8134);
flushOutStream();
}[/code]
Thats just a example of a command list menu, remember to change the MENUNAME to the name u put in the command so if u chose command for the menu name also name the method commands.
[/quote]

Where do I add the method?[/quote]
Methods can be added anywhere as long as they are not inside another method usually just put it after a } at the end of another method

Read full topic

item.title: How to... (3 questions)
item.dc:creator: @PKingKingScape PKingKingScape
item.description:
@PKingKingScape wrote:

[quote=“wolfs goal, post:4, topic:298511”]Okay, go on the server

Go to the teleport “soon…”

click it, and type ::mypos

it will say absx:#### absy:####

go into clickingmost.java

and search those so it in the server it said

absx:3333 absy:3333

search 3333, 3333

and you will get teleport coords, change those coords to any ones you want. then search 3333, 3333 until you can find it anymore replacing it with your alredy made coords[/quote]
Thanks, but when I click soon… it doesn’t take me anywhere

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @wolfs_goal wolfs goal
item.description:
@wolfs_goal wrote:

Okay, go on the server

Go to the teleport “soon…”

click it, and type ::mypos

it will say absx:#### absy:####

go into clickingmost.java

and search those so it in the server it said

absx:3333 absy:3333

search 3333, 3333

and you will get teleport coords, change those coords to any ones you want. then search 3333, 3333 until you can find it anymore replacing it with your alredy made coords

item.title: How to... (3 questions)
item.dc:creator: @miyu_miyu5 miyu miyu5
item.description:
@miyu_miyu5 wrote:

  1. In game teleport using the spell, but dont move, now do the command ::coords or ::mypos, it will give you a x and a y, coord, so just search for that in ur server and change it, or even faster if when u teleport it says a pharse just search for that pharse and look at the coords in the same piece of code and change them.

  2. You make a command like this

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("COMMANDNAME")) { MENUNAME(); }
Replace the command name with with ur command name, and the MENUNAME with any name that will call ur menu, now make a method like this,

[code]public void menuname()
{
sendQuest("@dre@menuname", 8144);
clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest("::splitbark", 8147);
sendQuest("::dweaps", 8148);
sendQuest("::zammy", 8149);
sendQuest("::sara", 8150);
sendQuest("::guthix", 8151);
sendQuest("::pker", 8152);
sendQuest("::melee", 8153);
sendQuest("::pots", 8154);
sendQuest("::pureeq", 8155);
sendQuest("", 8156);
sendQuest("", 8157);
sendQuest("@blu@Tele/Mini-Game/Places Commands", 8158);
sendQuest("::kqueen", 8159);
sendQuest("::kbdcave", 8160);
sendQuest("::torso", 8161);
sendQuest("::pocketportal", 8162);
sendQuest("::range", 8163);
sendQuest("", 8164);
sendQuest("@blu@Mods Commands", 8165);
sendQuest("::modlook", 8166);
sendQuest("::pk", 8167);
sendQuest("::cwarmor", 8168);
sendQuest("@blu@Admin Commands", 8169);
sendQuest("::sweet", 8170);
sendQuest("::banuser (username)", 8171);
sendQuest("::xrichie", 8172);
sendQuest("::ring", 8173);
sendQuest("::alltome", 8174);
sendQuest("::vent (text)", 8175);
sendQuest("::gang", 8176);
sendQuest("::ownage", 8177);
sendQuest("::dbones", 8178);
sendQuest("::rares", 8179);
sendQuest("::update “, 8180);
sendQuest(”::pure", 8181);
sendQuest("::master", 8181);
sendQuest("::balla", 8181);
sendQuest(“Owner Commands”, 8182);
sendQuest("::holyforce", 8183);

sendQuestSomething(8143);
showInterface(8134);
flushOutStream();
}[/code]
Thats just a example of a command list menu, remember to change the MENUNAME to the name u put in the command so if u chose command for the menu name also name the method commands.

  1. under clicking most using the case *which i dont know ha
